messages.message:
Looked into this:

```.sandbox/ibdev-backend/scripts/init-db:make build dev-dbinit -C $IB_HOME/shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db```
The sandbox setup script  (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/eece41e8c69067def7c8dbfe93d3c06d85afa8b9/.sandbox/ibdev-backend/scripts/init-db)calls `dev-dbinit`, which does 3 things:

1. It creates the MySQL DB iff it doesn't exist  (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db/tools/dbdevinit/main.go#L71)(equivalent of `create database ibdb`)
2. It runs migrations to bring the database schema up-to-date (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db/tools/dbdevinit/main.go#L146)
3. It inserts seed data into the database (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db/tools/dbdevinit/main.go#L168) (system user, default admin user, etc.)
`db-devinit` is idempotent, so you can run it any number of times w/o issue. I'm not sure why it failed to do (1) in your case, but I haven't been able to reproduce the problem myself.
